evidence_description: Databases containing unauthorized copies of intellectual property, cognitive work products, identity-linked metadata, and correlated physiological or behavioral response data.
source_of_evidence: identified and secured by rights holder
observed_content_characteristics: The datasets show systematic linkage between misappropriated intellectual content and recorded physiological or behavioral indicators of third parties, suggesting experimental or analytical use without consent.
legal_relevance: Evidence supports claims of intellectual property theft, unlawful experimentation through data-driven human profiling, and breaches of international human rights standards.
